DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Treatment Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.detailed_description: Principal objective : To define therapeutic effect Vitamin D chronic maintenance treatment COPD mean prospective randomize placebo-controlled double blind study 182 patient follow-up least one year . Primary endpoint median time next exacerbation . Secondary endpoint total number exacerbation per group , number exacerbation per patient per year , percentage patient one exacerbation per year , day antibiotics oral steroid , quality life , FEV1 , muscle force survival . Other objective : First , investigate role local systemic level 25-OHD 1,25- ( OH ) 2D intensity prevalence bacterial colonisation , inflammatory marker , proteases marker oxidative stress induce sputum exhale air . Second , explore whether correction Vitamin D deficiency oral supplementation Vitamin D trigger VDR-mediated cathelicidin pathway increase local systemic concentration natural antimicrobial polypeptide cathelicidin enhance eradication bacteria .
